title: Glottography dataset derived from Dedio et al. 2019 "Evidence for Britain and Ireland as a Linguistic Area"
description:
Cite the source of the dataset as:

Dedio, Stefan, Peter Ranacher & Paul Widmer. 2019. Evidence for Britain and Ireland as a Linguistic Area. Language 95(3). 498–522. doi: 10.1353/lan.2019.0054.
